basic_information.scholarship_name: Muzny Family Endowed Scholarship in Engineering
basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Engineering and Physics Scholarship Committe

description: This scholarship was created to honor the memory of Donnal "Don" F. Muzny and will provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Mathematics and Science who are pursuing a degree in the School of Engineering. The recipient(s) of the Muzny Family Endowed Scholarship in Engineering will be selected by a committee appointed by the Dean of the College of Mathematics and Science and will include representatives from the School of Engineering. The recipient(s) will be selected in the spring for distribution the following fall and/or spring semesters. Eligibility Requirements Major in a degree within the School of Engineering Minimum 3.0 GPA Junior or Senior status Provide a personal statement outlining career goals Financial need may be considered Previous recipients of the scholarship award are eligible for consideration
